attributes.action: Public enquiry into whether the Labour Government deliberately increased the levels of immigration to create a multicultural country
attributes.additional_details: There have been numerous reports in the press that Labour deliberately "opened the floodgates" to an uncontrolled flood of immigration in order to forever change the face of Britain, creating a multicultural society as well as to rub the Right Wing's nose in it. The nation needs a Public enquiry to establish whether this was in fact the case, and that the previous Labour Govenment deliberately increased the levels of immigration in order to to create a multicultural Britain, increase votes for Labour, and remove the arguments against continued EU membership as well as increase the numbers of people likely to be pro EU membership living in Britain.
